price: Mootummaan samiileefii dachii kan Rabbiiti. Rabbiin waan hunda irratti danda’aadha.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
